titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter from Count Starembergh, to the Duke of Lorraine, concerning the present condition of Vienna.
titleStmt.author: Starhemberg, Ernst Rüdiger, Graf von, 1638-1701.
Charles V, Duke of Lorraine, 1643-1690, recipient.
Starhemberg, Guido, 1657-1737.

notesStmt.note: Wing (2nd ed.) attributes to Starembergh, Guido-Balde, graf.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
